tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE channel_performance (
    channel_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    channel_name VARCHAR(50),
    platform_type VARCHAR(50),
    content_type VARCHAR(50),
    performance_metrics JSON
);

CREATE TABLE content_distribution_channels (
    channel_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    channel_name VARCHAR(50),
    platform_type VARCHAR(50),
    creation_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE performance_tracking (
    tracking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    channel_id INT,
    performance_metric VARCHAR(50),
    metric_value DECIMAL(10,2),
    tracking_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (channel_id) REFERENCES content_distribution_channels(channel_id)
);

CREATE TABLE content_performance_website (
  website_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  channel_id INT,
  views INT,
  clicks INT,
  time_on_page INT
);

CREATE TABLE content_performance_social_media (
  social_media_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  channel_id INT,
  likes INT,
  shares INT,
  comments INT
);

CREATE TABLE content_performance_website (
    content_id INT,
    website_id INT,
    views INT,
    clicks INT,
    conversions INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (content_id, website_id)
);

CREATE TABLE content_performance_social_media (
    post_id INT,
    social_media_id INT,
    likes INT,
    shares INT,
    comments INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (post_id, social_media_id)
);
